original_title: Cabaret Voltaire ‎– Live At The Hacienda. '83 / '86; 11.08.83 / 19.02.86.
overview: Features two shows both recorded at The Hacienda, Manchester on 11 August 1983 and 19 February 1986, plus 3 promotional videos all previously released on VHS: "No Escape" and "Sluggin Fer Jesus" on The Factory Complication (Factory Benelux, 1981) and "Yashar" on Johnny Yesno (Doublevision, 1983).
title: Cabaret Voltaire ‎– Live At The Hacienda. '83 / '86; 11.08.83 / 19.02.86.
